package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Packaging Utilities
package-manager.description: Package-manager independent suite of tools used to install, remove, and configure binary packages. Using an XML configuration file to describe the package, the pkgutils suite automatically downloads and installs packages including all necessary dependencies, provides information on the list of installed packages, removes packages, configures packages (runs the package pre-remove and post-install scripts), and queries a repository for a list of updated packages.

item.para: Add x86_64-suse-linux12 to list of systypes for --help option
